to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
Qilian county in Haibei Tibetan autonomous prefecture 海北藏族自治州[Hai3 bei3 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Qinghai
Qilian Mountains (formerly Richthofen Range), dividing Qinghai and Gansu provinces

sentences.english: The north area of Weihe River is located in the joint of the Qilian-North Qinling orogenic belt.
sentences.chinese: 天水渭北地區地處祁連與北秦嶺造山帶結合部位。

sentences.english: It comes from the Qilian Mountain and flows though about 35 kilometers within Jiayuguan.
sentences.chinese: 它發源於祁連山，流經大約35公里進入嘉峪關地區。

sentences.english: Establish 1985, factory address connects hill road in a surname 2651.
sentences.chinese: 創辦於1985年，工廠地址在祁連山路2651號。

sentences.english: Weibei area is located in the joint of the Qilian and North Qinling orogenic belts.
sentences.chinese: 天水渭北地區地處祁連與北秦嶺造山帶結合部位。

sentences.english: For the eastern section of QiLian mountain landscape management and landscape planning to provide a scientific basis.
sentences.chinese: 爲祁連山東段山地景觀管理域景觀規劃提供科學依據。

sentences.english: The average runoff remained steady basically for many years to many rivers in Qilian mountain regions;
sentences.chinese: 祁連山區許多河流多年均值基本穩定。

sentences.english: The forest change status of the Qilian Mountain during the Qing Dynasty and the Minguo period.
sentences.chinese: 清至民國時期祁連山區森林的破壞變遷狀況。

sentences.english: The mountains in the south are part of the Qilian mountain range.
sentences.chinese: 南部高山是祁連山脈的組成部分。

sentences.english: The flora which was found in Early Middle Carboniferous from North Qilian Z.
sentences.chinese: 報道了甘肅北祁連走廊區早中石炭世的沉積特徵。

sentences.english: North Qilian range was a intercontinental micro-oceanic basin of Early Paleozoic.
sentences.chinese: 早古生代北祁連是一個陸間微洋盆。

sentences.english: Iron ore deposits in upper reach of Yangluhe river are situated in the west Calidonian fold belt of the west Qilianshan mountain.
sentences.chinese: 羊露河上游鐵礦位於北祁連西段加里東褶皺帶西段。

definition: Yumen Pass, or Jade Gate, western frontier post on the Silk Road in the Han Dynasty, west of Dunhuang, in Gansu
